briefdescription.para: Atmosphere model of atmosphere through which vehicle is flying.
Object from which the aerodynamic coefficients are obtained.
Function returning control surface deflection, with input the control surface identifier.
List of custom functions for aerodynamic coefficient dependencies.
Boolean setting whether latitude and longitude are to be updated by updateConditions().
Current list of independent variables of the aerodynamic coefficient interface.

detaileddescription.para: List of independent variables of the control surface aerodynamic coefficient interface, with map key control surface identifiers.

memberdef.argsstring: (const std::shared_ptr< aerodynamics::AtmosphereModel > atmosphereModel, const std::shared_ptr< basic_astrodynamics::BodyShapeModel > shapeModel, const std::shared_ptr< AerodynamicCoefficientInterface > aerodynamicCoefficientInterface, const std::shared_ptr< reference_frames::AerodynamicAngleCalculator > aerodynamicAngleCalculator=std::shared_ptr< reference_frames::AerodynamicAngleCalculator >(), const std::function< double(const std::string &)> controlSurfaceDeflectionFunction=std::function< double(const std::string &)>())
memberdef.name: AtmosphericFlightConditions

briefdescription.para: Constructor, sets objects and functions from which relevant environment and state variables are retrieved.

detaileddescription.para:
Constructor, sets objects and functions from which relevant environment and state variables are retrieved.
atmosphereModel
Atmosphere model of atmosphere through which vehicle is flying
shapeModel
Model describing the shape of the body w.r.t. which the flight is taking place.
aerodynamicCoefficientInterface
Class from which the aerodynamic (force and moment) coefficients are retrieved
aerodynamicAngleCalculator
Object from which the aerodynamic/trajectory angles of the vehicle are calculated.
controlSurfaceDeflectionFunction
Function returning control surface deflection, with input the control surface identifier.

briefdescription.para: Function to update all flight conditions.

detaileddescription.para:
Function to update all flight conditions (altitude, density, force coefficients) to current state of vehicle and central body.
currentTime
Time to which conditions are to be updated.

briefdescription.para: Function to return atmosphere model object.

detaileddescription.para:
Function to return atmosphere model object
Atmosphere model object

briefdescription.para: Function to set custom dependency of aerodynamic coefficients.

detaileddescription.para:
Function to set custom dependency of aerodynamic coefficients. If needed, the AerodynamicCoefficientsIndependentVariables enum may be expanded to include e.g. control surface deflections, the values of which will then be retrieved from the function set here
independentVariable
Identifier of independent variable
coefficientDependency
Function returning the current value of the independent variable.

briefdescription.para: Function to return current central body-fixed velocity of vehicle.

detaileddescription.para:
Function to return central body-fixed velocity of vehicle.
Current central body-fixed velocity of vehicle.

briefdescription.para: Function to return object from which the aerodynamic coefficients are obtained.

detaileddescription.para:
Function to return object from which the aerodynamic coefficients are obtained.
Object from which the aerodynamic coefficients are obtained.

briefdescription.para: Function to return list of independent variables of the aerodynamic coefficient interface.

Function to return list of independent variables of the aerodynamic coefficient interface

briefdescription.para: Function to return list of independent variables of the control surface aerodynamic coefficient interface.

detaileddescription.para:
Function to return list of independent variables of the control surface aerodynamic coefficient interface
List of independent variables of the control surface aerodynamic coefficient interface, with map key the control surface identifiers.

briefdescription.para: Function to reset the current time of the flight conditions.

detaileddescription.para:
Function to reset the current time of the flight conditions. This function is typically sused to set the current time to NaN, indicating the need to recompute all quantities for the next time computation.
currentTime

briefdescription.para: Function to (compute and) retrieve the value of an independent variable of aerodynamic coefficients.

detaileddescription.para:
Function to (compute and) retrieve the value of an independent variable of aerodynamic coefficients
independentVariableType
Identifier for type of independent variable
secondaryIdentifier
String used as secondary identifier of independent variable (e.g. control surface name).
Current value of requested independent variable.

briefdescription.para: Function to update input to atmosphere model (altitude, as well as latitude and longitude if needed).
Function to compute and set the current freestream density.
Function to compute and set the current freestream temperature.
Function to compute and set the current freestream pressure.
Function to compute and set the current speed of sound.
Function to compute and set the current airspeed.

detaileddescription.para: Class for calculating aerodynamic flight characteristics of a vehicle during numerical integration.

Class for calculating aerodynamic flight characteristics of a vehicle during numerical integration. Class is used to ensure that dependent variables such as density, altitude, etc. are only calculated once during each numerical integration step. The get functions of this class are linked to the various models in the code that subsequently require these values.
